342008 343927 that one man's mundane

caller. You're on the air.

576409 579829 a jacket pocket, by the bed,

be going out for popcorn.

910285 913288 I'm sorry, baby. Are you OK?

1105146 1107399 but it may be the biggest ever.

1130338 1134092 and band memberJames Polton,

1232565 1235944 A virgin brain.

1240532 1243493 That the technology

1243535 1248123 to replace the body wire,

1258675 1261386 I'll get you a deck at my cost.

1270020 1272939 This is not
"like TV, only better."
1276192 1278361 It's a piece of somebody's life.

1278445 1282282 It's pure and uncut, straight

1292542 1295003 Anything. Whatever you want,

1298381 1300633 but I'm assuming

1300717 1302969 you want to ski,

1552344 1553803 that stands between me

2149649 2152569 Can we talk a little bit

2196321 2199908 But you just suck people along

2203161 2204913 to think about what

2211628 2214422 and you're getting strung-out.

2220345 2222722 I got a child, I got rent...

2225308 2226935 who doesn't send me

2226976 2229521 I'm just trying to hold on here.

2230522 2233400 I know you wouldn't say this

2427385 2430138 That'd be between me and Faith.

2449366 2452494 and the broken parts

2536453 2539247 No. Any day now. I just know it.
2547964 2549507 I got something for you, too.

2789914 2792667 Just let it alone, Lenny.

2798757 2801176 He gets off on tape,

2810810 2812437 To him, you're some kind

2814022 2816274 You're just something

2838421 2841758 targeted on making it,

2865156 2867951 he's even paying Max

2950950 2954120 without getting your fingers
